official-title.#text: To supplement the Secretary of the Army’s existing authorities to review the operations of reservoirs.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

short-title.#text: Fixing Operations of Reservoirs to Encompass Climatic and Atmospheric Science Trends Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: (NOAA), shall review its operation, including the water control manual and rule curves, using improved weather forecasts and run-off forecasting methods, including the Advanced Hydrologic Prediction System of the National Weather Service and the Hydrometeorology Testbed program of
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Administrator of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration

text.#text: Not later than 1 year after a request of a non-Federal sponsor of a reservoir, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Fixing Operations of Reservoirs to Encompass Climatic and Atmospheric Science Trends Act/s:2/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall determine if a change in operations, including the use of improved weather forecasts and run-off forecasting methods, will improve one or more of the core functions of the

text.#text: reducing risks to human life, public safety, property;
reducing the need for future disaster relief;
improving local water storage capability and reliability in coordination with the non-Federal sponsor and other water users;
restoring, protecting, or mitigating the impacts of a water resources development project on the environment; or
improving fish species habitat or population within the boundaries and downstream of a water resources project.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: regarding the results of such review.

text.#text: Not later than 90 days after completion of the review under this section, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , and pursuant to the procedures required under existing authorities, if the
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Fixing Operations of Reservoirs to Encompass Climatic and Atmospheric Science Trends Act/s:2/ss:c

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: determines from the results of the review that using improved weather and run-off forecasting methods improves one or more core functions of the
shall incorporate such changes in its operation and update the water control manual.

text.#text: As expeditiously as practicable and not later than 3 years after submission of the report under

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3988 IH: Fixing Operations of Reservoirs to Encompass Climatic and Atmospheric Science Trends Act
